author: fitz
msg: * subversion/bindings/ruby/client.c
(cl_log_message_func): new callback function to pass log messages
into client functions that require them.
(cl_get_parse_arg, cl_put_parse_arg): deleted.  they have no purpose
now that the client functions no longer use editor's.  at some
point, we will need to recreate this functionality (since there is
currently no way to receive notifications during an action), but
for now it can go away.
(cl_status): if 0'd out because it depends on code in wc.c, which
does not build yet.
(svn_ruby_init_client): commented out the rb_define_method for
cl_status.
(all other functions): bring up to date with regard to the arguments
the svn functions now take.  mostly this means changing from
svn_stringbuf_t's to const char *'s, removing arguments related to
xml files, putting in log message callbacks and batons, getting
rid of the editors that used to wrap some functions, and adding
new arguments that have been added since these were last updated.

author: philip
msg: Fix two locking bugs, one moving a directory into a sibling directory
(issue 931), the other reverting the copied directory (issue 932).
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc.h (svn_wc_revert): Rename optional_parent_access
to parent_access, and update documentation.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c (svn_wc_revert): Make access baton
parameter compulsory, remove optional open/close of access baton.
* subversion/libsvn_client/revert.c (svn_client_revert): Open and
close parent directory access baton.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c (wc_to_wc_copy): Handle locking when
moving a directory into a sibling directory.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/copy_tests.py
(basic_copy_and_move_files): Check cp/mv commands for errors.
(mv_and_revert_directory): New test.

author: cmpilato
msg: An initial attempt at making our python swig bindings build and
install a little more gracefully.
* subversion/Makefile.in
Two new rules: 'swig-py-ext' and 'install-swig-py-ext'.
* subversion/ac-helpers/apr.m4
Figure out the prefix dir for APR.
* subversion/bindings/swig/python/setup.py
Swipe the Right of First Refusal from distutils' options parsing!
* subversion/bindings/swig/INSTALL
Update the build/install information.
This is an empty revision for padding.
This is an empty revision for padding.
